oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Tribute - AES honors Nashville's Recording Engineer Pioneers - 2017-06-04
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Nashville chapter of the Audio Engineering Society pays tribute with the Lifetime Achievement awards to audio engineers Fred Cameron, Jack Linneman, and Brent Maher; mastering engineer John Eberle; and Carlo Sound founders Richard Carpenter and John Logan from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on June 4, 2017. Includes selected recorded excerpts and audio from video. Master of Ceremonies is Mike Porter.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Mike Porter;; John Jaszcz; John Eberle; Mike Bradley; John Logan; Margaret Carpenter; Richard Carpenter; Fred Cameron; Jack Linneman; Brent Maher; Johnny Rosen; Carl Tatz; David Sherman; Naomi Judd; Billy Linneman;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in Music / (20:56) Opening comments by Abi Tapia / (21:43) Walk-in music continues / (24:21) Welcoming comments by Abi Tapia and introduction of AES Lifetime Achievement Awards sub-committee chair John Jaszcz / (26:11) John Jaszcz gives overview of how this years candidates were chosen and introduction of Mike Porter / (27:29) Mike Porter opening comments / (29:36 Mike reads statement made by Denny Purcell / (30:06) Mike continues with brief introductory comments of all honorees / (31:40) John Eberle segment remarks by Mike Porter / (33:13) Eberle video segment with interviews / (39:29) Mike Bradley accepts award for John Eberle with acceptance remarks / (42:42) Carlo Sound segment honoring John Logan and Richard Carpenter remarks by Mike Porter / (44:12) Carlo video segment / (50:33) John Logan and Margaret Carpenter accepts the award with acceptance remarks / (52:41) Fred Cameron segment remarks by Mike Porter / (56:17) Cameron video segment /

(01:02:08) Phillip Cameron accepts award for Fred Cameron with acceptance remarks / (01:06:26) Mike Porter introduces Carl Tatz and David Sherman with post comments on John Logan / (01:07:32) Carl Tatz with remarks on John Logan / (01:08:38) David Sherman with remarks about John Logan / (01:10:13) Jack Linneman segment remarks by Mike Porter / (01:12:44) Jack Linneman video segment / (01:19:36) Johnny Rosen accepts award for Jack Linneman with acceptance remarks / (01:23:26) Brent Maher segment narrated by Mike Porter / (01:25:01) Maher video segment / (01:34:06) Audio excerpt montage of recordings Brent Maher has been involved with / (01:37:17) Remarks by Naomi Judd / (01:41:25) Acceptance remarks by Brent Maher / (01:45:27) Billy Linneman remarks about his father Jack Linneman / (01:46:35) Final comments from Mike Porter / (01:47:54) Walk-out music / (01:51:13) FILE END
